text: Castle tower Aldehuela Castle is a Spanish fortification located on the road between Jaén and Torredelcampo, in the province of Jaén. It was declared a Bien de Interés Cultural landmark according to decree on 22 April 1949 == References == * Eslava Galán, Juan: Los castillos de Jaén, Ediciones Osuna, Granada, 1999, * Valdecantos Dema, Rodrigo. Castillos de Jaén: Descubre el pasado de una tierra fronteriza, * Olivares Barragán, Francisco. 'Castillos de la Provincia de Jaén. C.S.I.C. Jaén, 1992, Category:Bien de Interés Cultural landmarks in the Province of Jaén (Spain)
title: Castle of Aldehuela
